name: Portal Hurdle
description:
Portal Hurdle is a speed running platformer game, hurry through two levels by using your good timing and dexterity and of course the portals. Let me know in the comments your score!

Web Browser Controls:

ENTER = START (Resets the game)

Z&X = A& B buttons

Arrowkeys = D-Pad

The clock pauses for the portaling animation, so portals are instant.

This was made for the Game Boy Showdown on GB Studio. This was both of our first times working on a Game Boy project, and we learned a lot through the process. It gives a greater understanding and appreciation of all the amazing games out there, and the clever ways they are able to overcome hardware limitations.

Doug Terhune - Programming and sound

YiNa Wang - Art
